snippet: A deputy foreign minister said that President Bashar al-Assad should remain in power and be included in elections as part of any diplomatic negotiation aimed at ending the civil war.
abstract: Iranian official reasserts country's insistence that Bashar al-Assad have role in postwar government, in direct contrast to America's and other countries' demand that Syrian dictator cede power completely.
lead_paragraph: A deputy foreign minister said that President Bashar al-Assad should remain in power and be included in elections as part of any diplomatic negotiation aimed at ending the civil war.

headline.main: Syria: Iran Reaffirms a Role for Assad
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Syria: Iran Reaffirms a Role for Assad
